name: Dungeoneer Hero
description:
My first complete RPGMaker game! Recruit a party of heroes and defeat the witch who holds the guardian diety hostage. Collect powerups and gear to improve your party. Defeat the dungeon denizens for their loot and buy  the supplies you need before heading out. If you die, just try again. 

You can start with the red portal because it's the easiest dungeon but it's all possible. Have fun!
